examples.example: 当别人给予我帮助时，我总会真诚地说：“谢谢你。”

translate.english: When others offer me help, I will always sincerely say: "Thank you."

examples.example: 我迷路时一位热心人帮我指路，我真诚地对他说：“谢谢你。”

translate.english: When I was lost, an enthusiastic person showed me the way, and I sincerely said to him, "Thank you."

examples.example: 我取得好成绩时，真诚地对老师说：“谢谢你。”

translate.english: When I got good grades, I sincerely said to the teacher: "Thank you."
